original_text:
Who has helped you utter these words?
    And whose spirit spoke from your mouth?
korean_text: 네가 누구를 향하여 말하느냐 누구의 정신이 네게서 나왔느냐

sentences.original_text: Who has helped you utter these words?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 당신이 이 말들을 하도록 도왔습니까?

sentences.original_text: And whose spirit spoke from your mouth?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 누구의 영혼이 당신의 입에서 말했습니까?
